configuration.tbelDecoder:
// Decode an uplink message from a buffer
// payload - array of bytes
// metadata - key/value object

/** Decoder **/

// decode payload to string
var payloadStr = decodeToString(payload);

// decode payload to JSON
 var data = decodeToJson(payload);

       B1_Inverter_Inverter_6_Inverter_Communication:data[5].data.Inverter_Communication,
        }
    
    },
     {  deviceName: 'Test_2',
        telemetry: {
     // rawData:payloadStr,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_DC_String1_Volt:data[2].data.DC_voltage_string_01/10,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_DC_String1_Watt:data[2].data.DC_power_string_01,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_DC_String2_Volt:data[2].data.DC_voltage_string_02/10,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_DC_String2_Watt:data[2].data.DC_power_string_02,

       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_DC_String3_Watt:data[2].data.DC_power_string_03,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_DC_String4_Volt:data[2].data.DC_voltage_string_04/10,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_DC_String4_Watt:data[2].data.DC_power_string_04,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_AC_Active_Power_Watt:data[2].data.AC_active_power/10,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_AC_Reactive_Power_var:data[2].data.AC_reactive_power,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_AC_Apparent_Power_VA:data[2].data.AC_apparent_power,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_Energy_Total_kWh:data[2].data.Energy_produced_Total_kWh,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_Energy_Daily_kWh:data[2].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_Volt_L1_L2:data[2].data.Phase1_to_phase2_voltage/10,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_Volt_L2_L3:data[2].data.Phase2_to_phase3_voltage/10,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_Volt_L3_L1:data[2].data.Phase3_to_phase1_voltage/10,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_Frequency_Hz:data[2].data.Grid_frequency/10,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_Active_Power_referance:data[2].data.Active_power_reference,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_Inverter_Status:data[2].data.Inverter_state,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_Fault_Code:data[2].data.Fault_code,
       B1_Inverter_Inverter_1_Inverter_Communication:data[2].data.Inverter_Communication,
        }
     }
   
   ,{deviceName: 'sum',deviceType:'inv_agg',
   telemetry: {
       INV_Tilldate_Energy_MWh:(data[0].data.Energy_produced_Total_kWh + data[1].data.Energy_produced_Total_kWh + data[2].data.Energy_produced_Total_kWh + data[3].data.Energy_produced_Total_kWh + data[4].data.Energy_produced_Total_kWh + data[5].data.Energy_produced_Total_kWh)/1000,
       INV_Total_Power:((data[0].data.AC_active_power/10)+(data[1].data.AC_active_power/10)+(data[2].data.AC_active_power/10)+(data[3].data.AC_active_power/10)+(data[4].data.AC_active_power/10)+(data[5].data.AC_active_power/10)),
       
       INV_DailyEnergy_Total:((data[0].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[1].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[2].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[3].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[4].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[5].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)),
       
       
       INV1_Generating_Mode:(data[0].data.AC_active_power/10>0) && data[0].data.Inverter_state==1,
       INV1_Trip_Mode:data[0].data.Inverter_state==0,
       INV1_Non_Comm:data[0].data.Inverter_Communication==0,
       
       INV2_Generating_Mode:(data[1].data.AC_active_power/10>0) && data[1].data.Inverter_state==1,
       INV2_Trip_Mode:data[1].data.Inverter_state==0,
       INV2_Non_Comm:data[1].data.Inverter_Communication==0,
       
       INV3_Generating_Mode:(data[2].data.AC_active_power/10>0) && data[2].data.Inverter_state==1,
       INV3_Trip_Mode:data[2].data.Inverter_state==0,
       INV3_Non_Comm:data[2].data.Inverter_Communication==0,
       
       INV4_Generating_Mode:(data[3].data.AC_active_power/10>0) && data[3].data.Inverter_state==1,
       INV4_Trip_Mode:data[3].data.Inverter_state==0,
       INV4_Non_Comm:data[3].data.Inverter_Communication==0,
       
       INV5_Generating_Mode:(data[4].data.AC_active_power/10>0) && data[4].data.Inverter_state==1,
       INV5_Trip_Mode:data[4].data.Inverter_state==0,
       INV5_Non_Comm:data[4].data.Inverter_Communication==0,
       
       INV6_Generating_Mode:(data[5].data.AC_active_power/10>0) && data[5].data.Inverter_state==1,
       INV6_Trip_Mode:data[5].data.Inverter_state==0,
       INV6_Non_Comm:data[5].data.Inverter_Communication==0,
   }
},{deviceName: 'cal',deviceType:'inv_agg',
   telemetry: {
     
       PV_Daily_Energy_Today:((data[0].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[1].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[2].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[3].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[4].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[5].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)),
       INV_Total_Power:((data[0].data.AC_active_power/10)+(data[1].data.AC_active_power/10)+(data[2].data.AC_active_power/10)+(data[3].data.AC_active_power/10)+(data[4].data.AC_active_power/10)+(data[5].data.AC_active_power/10)),
       Specific_Yield:((data[0].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[1].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[2].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[3].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[4].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10)+(data[5].data.Energy_produced_Daily_kWh/10))/720
   }
   
   }];

return result;
